column1: {'from': 'human'
column2: 'value': ' MTN MoKash savings works as follows:\n\nYou can save a minimum of UGX 500 and a maximum of UGX 1
column5: dial *165*3# or use the MoKash app. You can check your savings balance at any time by following the same steps.\n\nPlease note that while your savings are active
column6: they will earn a daily interest rate. The interest is calculated based on the principal amount and accrues daily. However
column7: you can only withdraw your savings once per month without incurring any fees.\n\nFor more information or assistance
column8: please contact our customer service team at 0800165665 or visit our website: www.momohive.com/uganda.'}

column1: {'from': 'gpt'
column2: 'value': ' Welcome to MTN MoKash! You can save money and earn interest of up to 5% per year. Set up a savings goal or make a deposit?'}]"

 {'from': 'human', 'value': " Your daughter in London can send money through MTN by following these steps:

1. She needs to register for MTN Mobile Money if she hasn't already done so.
2. Once registered, she should dial the MTN Mobile Money USSD code (*165*5#) on her phone.
3. Select 'Send Money'.
4. Enter your Mobile Money number (the one associated with your account in Uganda).
5. Enter the amount she wants to send.
6. Confirm the details and follow the prompts to complete the transaction.
7. She will then receive a confirmation message for the successful transfer."}
 {'from': 'gpt', 'value': ' Your daughter can send you money from London through several international money transfer services that partner with MTN Mobile Money. Would you like details on a specific service?'}]

8. Enter your Mobile Money PIN to complete the transaction

 {'from': 'human', 'value': " The automatic payment works by scheduling a specific amount to be deducted from your account and sent to a designated recipient at regular intervals. To set up an automatic payment, you can follow these steps:

1. Dial *165*5# on your phone.
2. Select the option for 'Automatic Payment'.
3. Enter the receiver's mobile money number.
4. Input the amount to be sent and choose whether it should be a one-time payment or a recurring payment.
5. Set the frequency of the recurring payments (daily, weekly, or monthly).
6. Confirm your selection by entering your Mobile Money PIN.
7. You will receive a confirmation message with details about your scheduled payment."}
 {'from': 'gpt', 'value': " You can set up automatic payments for Umeme. Here's how it works:

1. Set a maximum amount that can be automatically paid each month.
2. When Umeme issues your bill, MTN will automatically pay it if it's within your set limit.
3. You'll receive an SMS notification before and after each payment.
4. You can cancel or modify the arrangement at any time.
5. There's no additional fee for this service.

For instance, if you set a limit of UGX 100,000, any Umeme bill under that amount will be paid automatically. If a bill exceeds your limit, you'll receive a notification to approve it manually. Would you like to set up automatic payments for Umeme?"}]
